posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 01_Singleton å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼
posts.text: ç¬¬ä¸€æ¨¡å¼ Singleton-å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼Â· åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯åªéœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä¾‹ï¼š1ã€Factory2ã€Manager Â· å®ç°æ–¹å¼ä¸€ã€é¥¿æ±—å¼ ï¼ˆå¸¸ç”¨) 1ã€ä¼˜ç‚¹ â‘ ç±»åŠ è½½åˆ°å†…å­˜åï¼Œå°±å®ä¾‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªå•ä¾‹ï¼ŒJVMä¿è¯çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ï¼ˆä¸€ä¸ªç±»åªåŠ è½½ä¸€æ¬¡)ï¼› â‘¡ç®€å•å®ç”¨ï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼› 2ã€ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š â‘ ä¸ç®¡æ˜¯å¦ç”¨åˆ°ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šåœ¨ç±»è£…è½½æ—¶å®Œæˆå®ä¾‹åŒ–ï¼› â‘¡æ— æ³•é˜²ååºåˆ—ï¼› 3ã€å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼š â‘  public class Singleton_01 { // 2å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€çš„INSTANCEå®ä¾‹ private static final Singleton_01 INSTANCE = new Singleton_01(); // 1ç§æœ‰åŒ–é»˜è®¤æ„é€ æ–¹æ³• private Singleton_01 () {} // 3æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªè·å–æ–¹æ³• public static Singleton_01 getInstance(){ return INSTANCE; } public void service() {} //æµ‹è¯•æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå•ä¾‹ public static void main(String[] args) { Singleton_01 s1 = Singleton_01.getInstance(); Singleton_01 s2 = Singleton_01.getInstance() System.out.println(s1 == s2); } } â‘¡ // 2å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€çš„INSTANCEå®ä¾‹ private static final Singleton_01 INSTANCE = null; static { INSTANCE = new Singleton_01(); } äºŒã€æ‡’æ±—å¼ï¼š 1ã€ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šå®ç°æ‡’åŠ è½½ï¼Œåªåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹ 2ã€ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šæ— æ³•é˜²ååºåˆ— 3ã€å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼š â‘ ä¸€ä»£ï¼ˆçº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨ï¼‰ï¼š public class Singleton_02 { // 1ç§æœ‰åŒ–é»˜è®¤æ„é€ æ–¹æ³• private Singleton_02() {} // 2å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€çš„INSTANCEå®ä¾‹ï¼ˆvolatileï¼šæ€§èƒ½è°ƒä¼˜ï¼‰ private static volatile Singleton_02 INSTANCE = null; // 3æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªè·å–æ–¹æ³• public static Singleton_02 getInstance() { if (INSTANCE == null){ // try { // Thread.sleep(1); // } catch (InterruptedException e) { // e.printStackTrace(); // } INSTANCE = new Singleton_02(); } return INSTANCE; } public void service() {} public static void main(String[] args){ for(int i=0; i<100; i++){ new Thread(()->{ System.out.println(Singleton_02.getInstance().hashCode()); }).start(); } } } â‘¡äºŒä»£ï¼ˆè§£å†³çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨ï¼Œå¸¦æ¥ç”±äºä¸Šé”å¯¼è‡´çš„æ€§èƒ½é™ä½ï¼‰ï¼š // 3æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªè·å–æ–¹æ³• public static synchronized Singleton_02 getInstance() { if (INSTANCE == null){ // try { // Thread.sleep(1); // } catch (InterruptedException e) { // e.printStackTrace(); // } INSTANCE = new Singleton_02(); } return INSTANCE; } â‘¢ä¸‰ä»£ï¼ˆè§£å†³çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨ åŠ ä¸Šé”å¯¼è‡´çš„æ€§èƒ½é™ä½ï¼‰ï¼š // 3æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªè·å–æ–¹æ³• public static Singleton_04 getInstance() { if (INSTANCE == null) { synchronized (Singleton_04.class){ if (INSTANCE == null){ // try { // Thread.sleep(1); // } catch (InterruptedException e) { // e.printStackTrace(); // } INSTANCE = new Singleton_04(); } } } return INSTANCE; } ä¸‰ã€é™æ€å†…éƒ¨ç±»æ–¹å¼ï¼š 1ã€ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ï¼ˆç”±JVMä¿è¯å•ä¾‹ï¼‰ã€æ‡’åŠ è½½ 2ã€ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šæ— æ³•é˜²ååºåˆ— 3ã€å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼š public class Singleton_05 { // 1ç§æœ‰åŒ–é»˜è®¤æ„é€ æ–¹æ³• private Singleton_05() {} // 2é€šè¿‡é™æ€å†…éƒ¨ç±»åŠ è½½åˆ›å»ºé™æ€INSTANCEå®ä¾‹ private static class SingletonHolder { private final static Singleton_05 INSTANCE = new Singleton_05(); } // 3æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªè·å–æ–¹æ³• public static Singleton_05 getInstance(){ return SingletonHolder.INSTANCE; } public void service() {} public static void main(String[] args) { for(int i=0; i<100; i++){ new Thread(()->{ System.out.println(Singleton_05.getInstance().hashCode()); }).start(); } } } å››ã€æšä¸¾å•ä¾‹å¼ï¼š 1ã€ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š â‘ æ‡’åŠ è½½ â‘¡çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ â‘¢é˜²ååºåˆ—ï¼ˆæšä¸¾æ— æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰ 2ã€ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šåˆ«æ‰­ï¼Œä¸åƒä¸€ä¸ªç±» 3ã€å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼špublic enum Singleton_06 { //æšä¸¾å•ä¾‹ INSTANCE; //æ— æ„é€ æ–¹æ³• //æœ¬èº«æ— æ³•ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œæ•…å¯ä»¥æŒ‰å±æ€§ç›´æ¥è®¿é—® public void service() {} public static void main(String[] args) { for(int i=0; i<100; i++){ new Thread(()->{ System.out.println(Singleton_06.INSTANCE.hashCode()); }).start(); } } } Â·å›¾è§£å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼
